title: TestPullInvalidIgnoredSR flakyness + data race

labels.name: build
labels.description: Issues caused by or requiring changes to the build system (scripts or Docker image)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
It's not a race in our code, but calling `t.Fatal` from many goroutines or something which is not something that we're allowed. (And also a flakyness because this doesn't happen all the time either.)
